discourse_list.title: Defining the Crimson Creator Cluster with Hexonaut on Drinks w/MakerDAO Delegates

content.content: WTF is the Crimson Cluster   As the MakerDAO pivot to the Endgame Plan starts to take shape, the first proposal attempting to become a “MetaDAO” is the Crimson Creator Cluster.  This week we sat down with @hexonaut, the author of the Crimson Cluster proposal and discussed the inner workings of his proposal to the MakerDAO Community, what inspired him to stay with Maker and become a team member of PECU, and how to survive Crypto Winter. We really enjoyed learning about the Crimson Cluster and hope that you enjoy it as well.  Not Financial Advice This Content is for entertainment and informational purposes only, you should not construe any such information or other material as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice. Nothing contained on the FlipFlopFlap YouTube Channel constitutes a solicitation, recommendation, endorsement, or offer by @hexonaut  a.k.a Sam McPherson, @ultraschuppi a.k.a, Tim Schuppner @ElProgreso a.k.a, Frank Cruz @rspa a.k.a, Raphael Spannocchi, Flip Flop Flap Delegate LLC, Flipside Crypto, or any third party service provider to buy or sell any cryptocurrencies, securities, or other financial instruments. Nothing in this YouTube Video constitutes professional and/or financial advice.  The Tastings Hexonaut: ZKP (zero-knowledge proof) Coffee  Canada  2.13 Stars    El Pro: Game of Thrones Stout 2019 Special Edition   Brewery Ommegang, Cooperstown, New York  3.7 Stars     Schuppi: Greek bootleg Ouzo, Greece   4.73 Stars      Papa Raphael: Weleda Stilltee   - Tea for breastfeeding mothers. Contains Fennel, Aniseed, Verbena, Caraway and Fenugreek    3.145 Stars
